dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Net Result
dmca.body:
NetResult
Intellectual Property Protection

Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
SW6 5UA
Tel: 020 7471 1735
http://www.nr-online.com

Subject: FA Premier League: AV infringement - FAPL_NRDD14634

NetResult Internal Reference: FAPL_NRID14634

Please quote the above FAPL_NRID14634 reference in all communications with us regarding this issue.

Dear Sirs

The FA Premier League has the exclusive right to commerciall exploit all matches within The FA Premier League championships including, but not limited to, all movies images and other audio/video content.

We have noticed that your Web Site http://goonergoals.blogspot.com is displaying and/or offering The FA Premier League's audio visual content. It has embedded highlights from sites such as YouTube that the FA Premier League has not authorised and also provides information and direct links to illegal audiovisual content.

As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from The FA Premier League to use this content, your present use is an infringement of The FA Premier League's rights.

Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your web sites and confirm to use via email that you have done so.

Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an express or implied waiver of any of The FA Premier League's rights or remedies, including any rights or remedies in respect of infringement not explicitly stated, whether current or in the future, all of which are expressly reserved.

Formal Declaration

I hereby state that The FA Premier League is the owner of the exclusive rights referenced above and that NetResult is authorised to act on its behalf with respect to internet monitoring and compliance. On behalf of The FA Premier League I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of the content in the manner complained of is not authorised by The FA Premier League, its agents, or the law.

I, Tim Cooper, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of perjury that the information in the notice is accurate.

Yours sincerely,

Tim Cooper
NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
